EmailTemplate.name: Followup
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thanks for reaching out to YETI! I wanted to check in and offer my assistance if you have any questions regarding your recent product request. Feel free to reply to this email or give us a call at 512.402.5895 to further discuss your needs or to place your order.
Have a great day!
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
